org.ow2.proactive.jmx.provider.ro

Class ROServerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.jmx.provider.ro.ROServerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ROServerImpl
extends Object
implements Serializable

    A remote object representing a connector server. Remote clients can make connections using the newClient(Object) method. This method returns a Remote Object representing the connection.

    User code does not usually reference this class directly. Remote Object connection servers are usually created with the class ROConnectorServer. Remote clients usually create connections either with JMXConnectorFactory or by instantiating ROConnector.

    See Also:
